Description.Text: Other amenities / services: rooms with balcony, fridge, freshwater pool, internet, Wellness Center indoor heated saltwater pool, jacuzzi, steam room, gym, massage Conference venue. seasonal hotel

The hotel is ideal for excursions and is only 26 km from the city center and 4km from the port of Rafina, the Mati Marina is within walking distance, while Athens International Airport is 20 minutes by car
